void BuildingTypeExt::UpdateSecretLabOptions ( BuildingClass *  pThis  )  [static] 

00205 {
00206         BuildingTypeClass *pType = pThis->Type;
00207         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData* pData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(pType);
00208 
00209         DEBUGLOG("Secret Lab update for %s\n", pType->get_ID());
00210 
00211         if(!pData->Secret_Boons.Count || (pData->Secret_Placed && !pData->Secret_RecalcOnCapture)) {
00212                 return;
00213         }
00214 
00215         TechnoTypeClass *Result = pType->SecretInfantry;
00216         if(!Result) {
00217                 Result = pType->SecretUnit;
00218                 if(!Result) {
00219                         Result = pType->SecretBuilding;
00220                 }
00221         }
00222         if(Result) {
00223                 pThis->SecretProduction = Result;
00224                 return;
00225         }
00226 
00227         HouseClass *Owner = pThis->Owner;
00228         unsigned int OwnerBits = 1 << Owner->Type->ArrayIndex;
00229 
00230         DynamicVectorClass<TechnoTypeClass *> Options;
00231         for(int i = 0; i < pData->Secret_Boons.Count; ++i) {
00232                 TechnoTypeClass * Option = pData->Secret_Boons.GetItem(i);
00233                 TechnoTypeExt::ExtData* pTech = TechnoTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(Option);
00234 
00235                 if((pTech->Secret_RequiredHouses & OwnerBits) && !(pTech->Secret_ForbiddenHouses & OwnerBits)) {
00236                         if(!HouseExt::RequirementsMet(Owner, Option)) {
00237                                 Options.AddItem(Option);
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 
00242         if(Options.Count < 1) {
00243                 DEBUGLOG("Secret Lab [%s] has no boons applicable to country [%s]!\n",
00244                         pType->ID, Owner->Type->ID);
00245                 return;
00246         }
00247 
00248         int idx = ScenarioClass::Instance->Random.RandomRanged(0, Options.Count - 1);
00249         Result = Options[idx];
00250 
00251         DEBUGLOG("Secret Lab rolled %s for %s\n", Result->ID, pType->ID);
00252         pData->Secret_Placed = true;
00253         pThis->SecretProduction = Result;
00254 }
